summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 24 Piece Makeup Brushes Set | Horse Hair Professional Kabuki Makeup Brush Set Cosmetics Foundation Makeup Brushes Set Kits with White Cream-colored Case Bag
Review Date: 2015/08/29
Store: YOA
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {}
Review Text: These brushes are great! Soft and study!
Review Title: Five Stars
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Retinol 2.5 Serum for Face-Best Natural and Organic Skin Clearing For Wrinkles, Dark Spots and Crow's Feet
Review Date: 2016/05/27
Store: Ové Beauty
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Ové Beauty', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 2 inches; 0.96 Ounces', 'Item model number': '004', 'UPC': '632709797532'}
Review Text: I am a fan of Retinol Serums and this one is absolutely best!! I love the powerful effects of retinol; less lines, no more eyebrow wrinkles, firmer skin with a softer texture!! You just can't go wrong. I use it daily followed by a gentle moisturizer or vitamin C serum with jojoba oil! My pores are smaller. My acne has basically ceased (other than that time of the month when my hormones go crazy and even then it's still way better than it normally used to be!) I have even started using this on the back of my hands, ankles, knees, and chest to keep those areas hydrated and hopefully keep them from getting old looking!! I'm only 33 so my skin care journey is just starting to kick into full swing and now I'm really trying to keep ahead of the aging curve!! I know from my mom how quickly life can creep up on you before you know it! Plus, I currently smoke cigs so I need all the hydration I can get!! I think this retinol is doing an amazing job of holding off the signs of aging and I definitely plan to continue buying this serum!  I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.
Review Title: Stop Aging!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: EYE CREAM FOR WRINKLES, DARK CIRCLES and PUFFINESS with Vitamin C and Glycolic Acid. Enriched with Coenzyme Q10 for Eye Tightening & Superior Anti-wrinkle Results
Review Date: 2016/08/19
Store: Ové Beauty
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ové Beauty', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Skin Type': 'Mature,sensitive,all skin types', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '2.8 x 2.8 x 1.9 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '632709797617'}
Review Text: I bought this Best Under Eye Cream for Wrinkles, Dark Circles and Puffiness with Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin C, MSM, Glycolic Acid, Green Tea, Rosehip Oil and Coenzyme Q10 for the puffiness under my eyes. I don't have very dark circles but I do have them a little bit. I haven't noticed any change in the appearance of those dark spots but I have noticed that my puffiness and fine lines have been responding well to this cream. I can feel my eyes tightening up as the cream dries. I have noticed my skin feels more hydrated and looks and feels more firm! It's very easy to use and doesn't have a bad smell!! All I do is getting a very small amount on the tip of my middle finger then very gently tap it into the skin all around that area until it's absorbed. It takes a good few minutes but I try to be very gentle so I don't make that area look worse!! I use it in the morning as part of my moisturizing routine and then at night in my bedtime routine. This is a very great product! I do have one purple blood vein that runs down from my right eye that has recently popped up and this cream seems to be helping to make that less visible to me!! I love that!! Luckily, I found this product in time to hopefully keep that at bay! I am very happy with this product and will definitely continue to use it to see what other benefits I notice!!
Review Title: Reduced Puffiness!!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Alaboudi 50 New,, 5 Gram Clear Cosmetic Sample Containers for Gifts & Home-made,Plastic Pot Jars,Small Plastic Container,2 Mini Spatulas, 52 Small Stickers and Attractive Packaging
Review Date: 2016/09/26
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 6.3 x 1.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '753940391850'}
Review Text: I bought these Alaboudi 50 New, High Quality, 5 Gram Clear Cosmetic Sample Containers for Gifts & Home-made,Plastic Pot Jars,Small Plastic Container,2 Mini Spatulas, 52 Small Stickers and Attractive Packaging for my foundations and facial products. My mom and I like to make organic foundations as part of our products for sale at craft booths. These containers were too small to use for selling our product but they work very well as samples so we can let people try before they buy! It came with a bunch of labels that fit perfectly on the lids so we printed our contact info on them and hand them out when we're just walking around trying to drum up business! They are small but very handy! As far as the amount I really do not know the exact measurements but it is basically big enough to hold enough foundation for about 5-7 applications. The jar itself is about the size of a quarter and about half an inch tall. I am so happy we found these!! They are such a great marketing tool! And they are really excellent quality, I was so worried about the lids coming off but every single one has stayed tight! I will absolutely buy more of these, I really feel like they helped up to gain new customers and they looked really nice!
Review Title: Great marketing tool!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Professional Grade Retinol Anti-Aging Skin Moisturizing Cream - For Age Spots - By Swiss Botany
Review Date: 2017/05/31
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.69 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '791154469675'}
Review Text: I have used a ton of these moisturizers and this one is excellent! It keeps my forehead wrinkles at bay and protects my skin from the harsh elements in my life. I absolutely love it! I use two tiny pumps to cover my entire face and neck; always a good thing when the product helps you conserve by just being a great product! I love it
Review Title: Keep wrinkles away
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This person's purchase history reveals a strong preference for skincare and beauty products, particularly those focused on anti-aging and skin health. The consistent high ratings across various items indicate a positive sentiment towards products that contain effective ingredients like retinol and vitamin C, signaling an inclination toward quality formulations. 

Analyzing the data, the user frequently seeks products with natural and organic qualities, indicating a preference for health-conscious and eco-friendly items. Common themes include a focus on anti-wrinkle and hydration benefits, as evidenced by multiple positive reviews emphasizing improvements in skin texture, firmness, and reduced signs of aging.

Price sensitivity appears to be moderate; while the user is open to discounted products, they balanced cost against perceived quality. The emphasis on effective, easy-to-use products suggests a practical approach to skincare routines, with additional interest in items that facilitate marketing and brand promotion for personal ventures, like homemade cosmetics.

In conclusion, the core preferences can be distilled into: a strong commitment to high-quality, effective anti-aging skincare and beauty tools, a preference for natural ingredients, and a practical mindset towards product usability and marketing effectiveness.

target_interaction.title: Smells amazing
target_interaction.text: This is such a nostalgic scent! Reminds me of high school! I love it!
target_interaction.title_meta: Grass by Gap, Women's Body Mist 2020 Design - 8 oz 236 ml
description: Grass by Gap Body Mist 8 fl oz/236 ml A body mist is lighter, softer and less concentrated. Body mist offers a pleasant all-over scent without being overpowering with a crisp mix of spring leaves and waterlilly paired with blonde amber woods.
